text: The 2004–05 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers men's basketball team represented Western Kentucky University during the 2004–05 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Hilltoppers were led by head coach Darrin Horn and All Sun Belt Conference guard, Anthony Winchester.SBC 2016-17 Basketball Media Guide, retrieved 28 April 2020 They finished 2nd in the SBC East Division and were invited to the 2005 National Invitation Tournament. Future NBA player Courtney Lee was SBC Freshman of the Year and was named to the SBC All Tournament team.WKU Basketball Media Guide retrieved 21 April 2020 ==Schedule== 2004-05 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers Schedule and Results, Sports Reference, retrieved 29 April 2020 |- !colspan=6| Regular Season |- |- !colspan=6| 2005 Sun Belt Conference Men's Basketball Tournament |- !colspan=6| 2005 National Invitation Tournament ==References== Western Kentucky Category:Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball seasons Western Kentucky Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's
title: 2004–05 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball team
